description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

19 Alwyne Villas, Islington London N1 2HG
 

TPO Reference

Tree pruning works to T17 – Lime rear garden & T18 – Holly front garden of LBI TPO (No.352) 2007

 

PO Number

 T090445

Work specifications

TPO (No.352) 2007 T17 – Lime rear garden Reduce back to original pollard points.

TPO (No.352) 2007 T18 – Holly front garden, shape crown to a mushroom shape, by removing new shoots coming out from the crown, crown lift to 2.5 metres to create room over the footpath and even shape of the Holly
decision_conditions:
To ensure the long term canopy cover in this area, the Authority requires a Tilia mongolica (Mongolian Lime) (14-16 stem diameter) be planted near by as a pre- emptive replacement  preparing for the removal in the future of  LBI TPO (No.352) 2007- T17 –Lime. Written confirmation must be provided to the local authority that the tree has been planted and established. 

The Tilia mongolica (Mongolian Lime) must be healthy and established and of suitable size for it to be considered as an eventual replacement for LBI TPO (No.352) 2007 T17 -Lime
